data.title: $100 Invested In This Stock 20 Years Ago Would Be Worth This Much Today - Microsoft  ( NASDAQ:MSFT )
data.summary: Microsoft MSFT has outperformed the market over the past 20 years by 6.62% on an annualized basis producing an average annual return of 14.45%. Currently, Microsoft has a market capitalization of $2.77 trillion.

data.title: Why Microsoft Stock Tumbled 3.7% Today
data.summary: Microsoft ( NASDAQ: MSFT ) had one of its more forgettable sessions on the stock market Wednesday, with its share price melting by 3.7% at closing time. Yet this had less to do with its own operations, and more to do with a move by a business in which it's invested.

data.title: NBIS vs. MSFT: Which AI Infrastructure Stock is the Better Buy?
data.summary: Microsoft appears to be a better investment option compared to Nebius at the moment.

data.title: Microsoft Analyst Lowers Rating, Flags Slower Growth, Flat Valuation Outlook - Microsoft  ( NASDAQ:MSFT )
data.summary: Keybanc Capital Markets downgrades Microsoft to Sector Weight, citing cautious outlook on bookings and slower deal cycles heading into 2025. Analyst Jackson Ader lowers Microsoft's revenue growth expectations, citing weak enterprise guidance and the impact of the dollar's reversal
